title: Veggie Cafe
typeOfFood: Indian, International, Italian, Raw, Take-out, European
description: A 100% vegan/vegetarian cafe offers a daily fresh menu, including soup (pumpkin, tomato, Russian borsh, falafel roll with fresh vegetables, roll with 2 cheeses and vegetables, fresh salad, made-in-house muffins and other desserts, smoothies (fruits and vegetables), made-in-house lemonade, a large selection of tea and more. No alcohol is served. Best view on Botanicheskiy sad (Botanical Garden). English speaking staff.
streetAddress: Aptekarskiy Prospect 4, Loft Contour Family, 4th Floor
